Package org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.controller

Class CardController

java.lang.Object
org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.controller.CardController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/cards") public class CardController extends Object
REST controller for managing Card entities.

Provides endpoints for CRUD operations on card resources. Utilizes CardService to interact with the data layer and perform operations on card entities.

  • GET /api/cards - Retrieves all cards.
  • GET /api/cards/{id} - Retrieves a specific card by its ID.
  • POST /api/cards - Creates a new card.
  • PUT /api/cards/{id} - Updates an existing card by its ID.
  • DELETE /api/cards/{id} - Deletes a card by its ID.
See Also:

  • Card

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Card> getById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a specific Card by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the card to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the card if found, or a 404 Not Found response if not found.

      Parameters:
